Fatone 的 The Philosophy of Nagarjuna，此书的原来题名是El Budismo Nihilista，但作者并不认为龙树便是一位虚无论者（Nihilist）。

list.abs: ...收藏查看科塔尔综合征科塔尔综合征（Cotard syndrome） ：以虚无妄想（nihilistic delusion）和否定妄想 （delusion of negation）为核心症状患者主要是认为自身躯体和内部器官发生了变化.

最极端的虚无主义（nihilistic）拥护者们坚持认为，建立在行为科学基础上的各种国际关系理论反映的是社会力量，而不是用于证明、 …
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(93) ... nihilist 虚无主义者 nihilistic 虚无主义的 nihility 无效.

entry.def: Nihilism is a belief which rejects all political and religious authority and current ideas in favour of the individual.

example.ex: Why should a great community like a university be afraid of nihilism?
example.tran: 为什么像大学这样人才济济的社区要害怕虚无主义呢？

means.word_mean: 1. someone who rejects all theories of morality or religious belief

auth_sentence.content: With regard to religion I class myself as an existential nihilist.
auth_sentence.res_content: With regard to religion I class myself as an existential nihilist.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: With regard to religion I class myself as an existential nihilist.

auth_sentence.content: I agree, there may be some nihilist feelings or language, but some language says otherwise.
